title: Pickering Portrait Polar Bear for trade raw (nice eye appeal)
author: ahmanfan

posts.post_title: Pickering Portrait Polar Bear for trade raw (nice eye appeal)
posts.post_content:
Last card I am selling or trading from a collection I bought last year. Was glued in an album but soaked off with VERY little paper loss, only a speck on reverse at bottom. Technical grade would be a 1-1.5 but great looking card if you need one.

Open to trading for essentially anything. I have no attachment to the card. 

Vintage football, basketball, baseball. Another t206, or 33 Goudey HOFer in low grade. If you want the card throw something out there in the $50-100 range. [IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20230825/8d2ce965a05994512e88ad0bccdc28ae.jpeg[/IMG]


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Here is the back pic. [IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20230825/0819152440be3e6b29c5ca50a50f02e5.jpeg[/IMG]


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

I have lots to trade.  See:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=337407[/url]
How much are you looking for? I have a Pickering common back that I would trade and add a little cash if that interests you. If not I'm interested in buying it outright.
